casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 31, 2011

[Cite as 05/31/2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-2578.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2011-0563. Wimmer v. Ohio Edison Co.

Public Utilities Commission, No. 09-777-EL-CSS. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Public Utilities Commission of Ohio.

Upon consideration of the motion of Ohio Edison Company for leave to intervene as appellee, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
